ai-ds2.3.1:22.1_0: What things should be given up by vision?
ai-ds2.3.1:22.3_0: identity view, doubt, misapprehension of precepts and observances,
ai-ds2.3.1:23.2_0: Take an uneducated ordinary person who has not seen the noble ones, and is neither skilled nor trained in the teaching of the noble ones. They’ve not seen good persons, and are neither skilled nor trained in the teaching of the good persons.
ai-ds2.3.1:23.4_0: They regard perception as self, self as having perception, perception in self, or self in perception.
ai-ds2.3.1:23.6_0: consciousness as self, self as having consciousness, consciousness in self, or self in consciousness.
ai-ds2.3.1:23.7_0: the view of such views, the recipients of views, the opposite of the wrong view, the resort to the recipients of wrong view. Their view of what is wrong thought, the opposite, the intention to activity of the paths.
ai-ds2.3.1:24.2_0: You have doubts about the teaching, uncertainty, and uncertainty regarding the Buddha, the teaching, and the Saṅgha. You live having gone beyond doubt, got rid of indecision, and uncertainty regarding the teachings. You doubts about the past and uncertainty.
ai-ds2.3.1:24.3_0: Such uncertainty is the uncertainty of doubt, uncertainty, and doubt regarding the mind, without doubt, conceit, the thought, and the mind is without doubt.
ai-ds2.3.1:25.1_0: Herein, what is accomplishment in ethics?
ai-ds2.3.1:25.2_0: They understand: ‘Purification of ethics is pure in ethics, purification of view, ethical conduct, and view.’ Such view is purification through the opposite of the wrong view. Their view of what is wrong thought. Their view of what is wrong thought, not the opposite is the wrong way, the rotten inside, the path, the opposite of the sun, and the resortment forces. This is the recipient of his view, and the recipient of another.
ai-ds2.3.1:25.3_0: This is called misapprehension of precepts and observances.

ai-ds2.3.1:51.1_0: What things are the wrong way?
ai-ds2.3.1:51.2_0: there are five kinds of deeds: the method and the wrong view.
ai-ds2.3.1:51.3_0: these things are wrongful and have a fixed destiny.
ai-ds2.3.1:52.1_0: What things are they righteous and have a fixed destiny?
ai-ds2.3.1:52.3_0: these things are righteous and have a fixed destiny.
ai-ds2.3.1:53.1_0: What things have a fixed destiny?
ai-ds2.3.1:53.2_0: apart from those things that are skillful and unskillful, blameless in the formless realm.
ai-ds2.3.1:53.3_0: The feelings constituent group, the consciousness constituent group, the dimension of consciousness, the dimension of nothingness, the dimension of neither perception nor non-perception.
ai-ds2.3.1:53.5_0: These are the things that do not have a fixed destiny.
ai-ds2.3.1:54.1_0: What things have Path as their objects?
ai-ds2.3.1:54.2_0: The noble paths arise, mental factors and thoughts arise in the mind.
ai-ds2.3.1:54.3_0: These are the things that have Path as their objects.
ai-ds2.3.1:55.1_0: What things have Path as their roots?
ai-ds2.3.1:55.3_0: That is: form, feeling, perception, choices, and consciousness.
ai-ds2.3.1:55.4_0: these things have Path as their roots,
ai-ds2.3.1:55.5_0: the noble path with the eight factors as a practice, and right view associated with it ...
ai-ds2.3.1:55.6_0: these things have Path as their roots,
ai-ds2.3.1:55.7_0: The noble eightfold path is excessive and bad.
ai-ds2.3.1:55.8_0: these things are the path leading to the midst of the lay life,
ai-ds2.3.1:55.9_0: That is: form, feeling, perception, choices, and consciousness.
ai-ds2.3.1:55.10_0: these things have Path as their roots,
ai-ds2.3.1:56.1_0: What things do they have Path as their predominant?
ai-ds2.3.1:56.2_0: They lead the noble path, which arise with the mind, and mental factors.
ai-ds2.3.1:56.4_0: For he will speak the path to the regulations regarding the noble eightfold path.
ai-ds2.3.1:56.5_0: That is: form, feeling, perception, choices, and consciousness.
ai-ds2.3.1:57.2_0: Any things that are born, being born, appearing, arising, turning up, and ending of form arisen remaining, feeling arises.
ai-ds2.3.1:57.3_0: These are the things that have arisen,
ai-ds2.3.1:58.2_0: There are things that are not born, born, and have not arisen, generate, unborn, unattached, steadfast, and jealousy.
ai-ds2.3.1:58.3_0: These are the things that have not arisen.
ai-ds2.3.1:59.2_0: (There is) wholesome and result in the formless realms, the result of wholesome forms, in the formless-world sphere, not in the formless-world sphere.
ai-ds2.3.1:59.3_0: The feelings constituent group, the consciousness constituent group, the dimension of consciousness, the dimension of nothingness, the dimension of neither perception nor non-perception.
ai-ds2.3.1:59.4_0: But whatever form he’s performed, he will arise,
ai-ds2.3.1:60.2_0: When these things have passed, ceased, and perished, consciousness has passed away. They’ve gone beyond all form, feeling, perception, choices, and consciousness.
ai-ds2.3.1:61.2_0: There are things that are born, unborn, not being reborn, not yet arisen, consciousness is not arisen. They are not reborn in the future. They are not attached to form, feeling, perception, choices, and consciousness.
ai-ds2.3.1:62.2_0: Any things that are born, being born, appearing, arising, and vanishing of form is produced.
ai-ds2.3.1:62.3_0: These are the things that are present.
ai-ds2.3.1:63.2_0: In the past, future, or present these things arise,
ai-ds2.3.1:64.2_0: In the future, thoughts, minds, and thoughts arise in the present life—
ai-ds2.3.1:64.3_0: These are the things that are future objects.
ai-ds2.3.1:65.1_0: What things are the present objects?
ai-ds2.3.1:65.2_0: These things arise in the present phenomena:
ai-ds2.3.1:65.3_0: these things are the present objects.
ai-ds2.3.1:66.2_0: Their formations of sentient beings are attached to form, feeling, perception, choices, and consciousness.
ai-ds2.3.1:67.1_0: What are the things that are external?
ai-ds2.3.1:67.2_0: Those qualities that decay a person with internal form. They are attached to another, blind to the drawbacks of those forms.
ai-ds2.3.1:67.3_0: These are the things that are another’s
ai-ds2.3.1:68.1_0: What things are his own and another’s?
ai-ds2.3.1:68.3_0: these things are his own and another’s.
ai-ds2.3.1:69.0_0: and yet they treat themselves as objects.
ai-ds2.3.1:69.2_0: Intentional thoughts arise: these things arise in the mind,
ai-ds2.3.1:70.2_0: Thoughts that arise with external mind and phenomena:
ai-ds2.3.1:70.3_0: These are the things that are external objects.
ai-ds2.3.1:71.1_0: What things are internal and external objects?
ai-ds2.3.1:71.2_0: Thoughts that arise internally and externally
ai-ds2.3.1:71.3_0: these things are internal and external objects;
ai-ds2.3.1:72.1_0: What things are hard to comprehend?
ai-ds2.3.1:72.3_0: these things are visible and have impingement.
ai-ds2.3.1:73.1_0: What things are not visible and without impingement?
ai-ds2.3.1:73.2_0: The sense fields of the eye, ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind.
ai-ds2.3.1:73.3_0: These are the things that are not visible and have impingement.
ai-ds2.3.1:74.1_0: What things are not visible and without impingement?
ai-ds2.3.1:74.2_0: The feelings constituent group, the perceptions constituent group, the (volitional) processes constituent group, the consciousness constituent group.
ai-ds2.3.1:74.3_0: But whatever form is not penetrated, untroubled, sought the sense fields,
ai-ds2.3.1:74.4_0: the elements of the unconditioned elements:
ai-ds2.3.1:74.5_0: These are the things that are not visible and have impingement.
